title: One of the Guys
description: From the Amazon website:"Kate is helping her best friends Lucy and Jackson plan their wedding and is attempting to juggle a few romances of her own. Everyone is questioning when it’ll finally be Kate’s turn to walk down the aisle, but she can’t even manage to hang on to a boyfriend! She does have several options, though. There’s Chris, the smooth, sexy photographer. And then there’s Max, the boy next door “friend with benefits…” Kate can't help but wonder - is it possible to date one of your guy friends? How about two? At the same time? Which one of the guys will she choose?"
author: Jessica  Goodwin
